title: Vol'koz BUG
body: When Vol'koz {{champion:161}} meets Illaoi{{champion:420}}  in a game,  Vol'koz will disappear attack animation twice in every three. Sometimes after he use spells, his three tentacles straighten up even when he moves.[SEE THE SCREENSHOT OF THE BUG](https://goo.gl/photos/PLkU1S8QEvn7Hr5x6)

replies.body:
Hey! 

Thanks for taking the time to submit a bug! We're currently investigating what's going on with Vel'Koz. :]
I have had this too. It is very irritating and honestly throws me off my game since he looks like a weird space ship.

> [{quoted}](name=Blackdragn18,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=ykyx8ZEy,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-12-02T17:40:54.419+0000)
>
> I have had this too. It is very irritating and honestly throws me off my game since he looks like a weird space ship.

Agreed. I posted another thread in the forum with a possible reason. ive only noticed the bug in games with Illaoi. I think it might have to do with the animations of the tentacles.
It happened to me all game last night. sometimes it would straighten and sometimes it would just freeze the character and lasers would come out of nowhere.
Yup this is happening to me as well, 2 out of three sounds about right. Getting the tentacle straightening out as well. Makes last hitting a challenge with him.

Just came to report bugs with him, glad to see someone else has done so. I've also noticed lately that my ult just doesn't work sometimes. Either it will just totally ignore my cursor to aim and just stay firing in one spot or it will just not do anything at all but lock him in the channel position with no lasers firing whatsoever. I've also been using his Battlecast skin, if that matters. I don't know how to get the bugs to happen, though I have noticed (or think I noticed) that his ult seems to bug out after throwing out Q, W, and E all at once. It's really killing my games :[
It also happens in his Arclight skin.
